mapper.select: select count(*) from payment where buyer=#{id}and parentseq=(select parentseq from payment where buyer=#{id}and paymentable=#{y})

select distinct name,payment.item,payment.buyer,payment.seller,payment.parentseq,price,to_char(payment.paymentdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')as paymentdate,payment.boardtype from payment join person on (person.id=payment.seller)where payment.buyer=#{id} and payment.boardtype=#{product}and payment.paymentable='y'

select distinct name,contents,payment.item,payment.buyer,payment.seller,payment.parentseq,price,to_char(payment.paymentdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')as paymentdate,payment.boardtype,review.reviewable from payment join person on (person.id=payment.seller)join review on (review.reviewer =payment.buyer and review.recipient = payment.seller and review.parentseq = payment.parentseq )where payment.buyer=#{id} and payment.boardtype=#{product}and payment.paymentable='y'
